data.title: Trending Stocks Rated Top Buy This Week Include Microsoft And Netflix
data.text: November has seen strong gains after surging due to election relief and vaccine-related euphoria. For the first time since the start of the pandemic, there may be a light at the end of the tunnel.

data.title: Biden urged to reject Big Tech's influence by 32 advocacy groups
data.text: Thirty-two groups including ones focused on antitrust, consumer advocacy and progressive issues sent a letter to President-elect Joe Biden on Monday urging him to reject the influence of Big Tech companies on his administration.

data.title: 9 Video Game Stocks to Buy for Next-Gen Gains
data.text: Video games offered a respite from the shock of the novel coronavirus. So, logically, lightning could strike twice for this viable sector.

data.title: Microsoft Comes After Zoom With All-Day Free Video Calls
data.text: Teams will offer free 24-hour meetings "until further specified."

data.title: 7 ESG Investing Ideas That Could Add to Your Wallet and to Your Soul
data.text: ESG investing can help create value both for society and shareholders. These seven ESG stocks are a good place to start.
